main.name: Hatem Saadallah
main.occupation: Data Scientist and Full Stack Developer
main.description: I have been playing with code since I was 12, so I know a thing or two
main.bio: I am a young man from Palestine. I have a fine experience with Web Development. I am comfortable with Bootstrap, Jquery and for backend, I can work on Python Flask efficiently. My own vision is to make a major affirmative change in the Arab region. I am eager to put work with everyone who shares my vision and move forward with our big community. I have a wide range of interests, I am a science enthusiast and a political and social activist. I am specifically interested in sustainability. In my free time, I love to play chess, watch TV series and drink coffee.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I joined Code for Palestine after I finished 10th grade, I attended the first camp in August 2015 in Jericho, I learned a lot of things, it was my first time ever to be part of such a program and meet foreigners.

work.title: Senior Instructor
work.description: As a former student of Code for Palestine program, I was honored to join the second camp of Code for Palestine as teacher assistant helping with teaching and facilitating some other barriers, like languages and culture.   This experience has taught how is to be a manager, and how responible you should be to keep order.

work.company: Al Nayzak Organization for Supportive Education and Scientific Innovation
work.title: S.T.E.P 2016 Finalist
work.description: The Scientific and Technological Entrepreneurship Program - S.T.E.P 2016, it is a program to qualify students so they are able to create a project based on a STEM basis. I joined this program, during the program time, I took courses on website coding, self-learned how to create a website. It was a game-changing, I was awarded an honorary prize by the Minister of Education. It changed my life completely.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand

projects.title: Resume Website

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
